A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As the oppressive forces of super-nerddom close in around me like an Imperial Death Squadron in pursuit of a rogue rebel ship\, I'm reminded of how exhausting it must be to be a Star Wars purist. Do these people get any joy out of anything other than mother's speedy basement food-delivery service? If being a fanatic means not being able to enjoy a movie as interesting as The Last Jedi\, that is a full-time job I have no interest in.
